item.title: ‘Pachinko’ Star Kim Minha’s North Korean Refugee Drama ‘Hana Korea’ Unveils First Trailer Ahead of Busan Bow (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: The first trailer has been unveiled for “Hana Korea,” a North Korean refugee drama starring “Pachinko’s” Kim Minha, ahead of its world premiere at the Busan International
